full_summary:
# Learning Centre Modernization Project
## PW-22-01008400

### International Tenders
#### Request for Information (RFI)
**Open to All Suppliers**

Employment and Social Development Canada invites all qualified suppliers to submit their responses to a Request for Information (RFI) related to the Learning Centre Modernization project.

**Project Details**
* **Project Title**: Learning Centre Modernization
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01008400
* **Publication Date**: September 28, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: The tender has expired, as previously announced.

**Contrast Requirements**
The following trade agreements apply to this project:

* Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Commodity Quantities**
* Quantity not specified
* Duration of contract: to be determined
* Time frame of delivery: to be determined

**Conditions of Participation**
All qualified suppliers are invited to participate. Suppliers are not required to meet specific conditions of participation beyond those specified in the solicitation documentation.

**Point of Contact**
For more information or to submit your responses to the RFI, please contact David Priori, located at:

* Employment and Social Development Canada
* 140 du portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0J9
* Phone: 613-793-7601
* Email: david.priori@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* Contact URL: None

**Attachment**
The RFI documents are available for download at the following URLs:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/7daeafb547801eecf60d5430b35a99d4/100021680_-_rfi_-_english.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/9fc1442004b4437b87eca3054fd91a65/100021680_-_rfi_-_french.pdf

 All suppliers are encouraged to participate in this RFI. Please submit yourresponses to the RFI before the tender closing date. Suppliers are encouraged to consult the solicitation documentation for more information. 

**Note**: The original document contains substantial irrelevant information and much more details which wasn't clarified. Be very cautious while working on writing significant documents. Possibly timeline, due dates, and all unusual criteria should be prioritized discussing in the document.
